column1: # The 1920s rainfall sheet has a note saying that the gauge is in Chubb Hill Gardens.
# The Chubb Hill Gardens (Nurseries) rain gauge is shown on the 1911 Ordnance Survey map.
# So the headings to the 1910s and 1920s rainfall sheets (Crescent Avenue and Ocean Road) seem likely to be observer addresses, not where the gauge resided.
# The most likely sequence of events seems to be that the gauge moved from the original Royal Crescent site to Chubb Hill Gardens in 1908.
# The readings for October and November 1912 are estimates and have been omitted.
# The readings for October to December 1923 are estimates and have been omitted.
